agentFeedbackHistory.feedback:
CHIEF OF STAFF FEEDBACK - ACTION AUDIT RESULT
==============================================
Agent: ContentManager
Action ID: action_UQIOifb5-Htu
Status: WARNING

CONSTRAINT VIOLATIONS:
- L7_MINIMUM_REVENUE_PROBABILITY: L7 Guardrail: Action lacks minimum revenue probability (15% threshold)

REQUIRED CORRECTION:
• L7 Master Directive requires all actions to have a minimum 7-day revenue probability of 15%. Add revenueImpact with confidence >= 0.15.

═══════════════════════════════════════════════
SUGGESTED REVENUE-ALIGNED REWORD
═══════════════════════════════════════════════
ORIGINAL: "STRATEGIC RECOVERY: Improve Customer Retention by 15%"
REWORD TO:

ACTION: "Drive measurable revenue through strategic recovery: improve"
DESCRIPTION: "Execute strategic recovery: improve customer retention by 15% with explicit focus on converting engaged prospects to revenue-generating customers"
EXPECTED OUTCOME: "Achieve [X]% conversion rate, generating $[Y] in [ARR/MRR/pipeline]"
REVENUE IMPACT: { type: "[ARR/MRR/pipeline]", estimatedValue: [amount], confidence: [0.5-0.9] }

REQUIRED ELEMENTS:
• Specific conversion metric (% or count)
• Dollar value tied to ARR, MRR, or pipeline
• Confidence level based on historical data
• Clear path from action to revenue

EXAMPLE FOR ContentManager:
"Convert [audience] to [revenue action] generating $[X] in [revenue type]"

RESUBMISSION INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Use the suggested reword above as your new action
2. Ensure you include specific revenue targets (ARR/MRR/pipeline $)
3. Focus on conversion outcomes, not engagement metrics
4. Resubmit through the standard action flow

The CoS will automatically approve revenue-aligned actions.

CHIEF OF STAFF FEEDBACK - ACTION AUDIT RESULT
==============================================
Agent: CMO
Action ID: action_8Q7nKVRKNSBx
Status: VETOED

CONSTRAINT VIOLATIONS:
- OPTIMIZE_FOR_CONVERSION: Action optimizes for engagement metrics without conversion tie
- TIE_TO_REVENUE: Action does not tie to ARR, MRR, or pipeline value
- L7_MINIMUM_REVENUE_PROBABILITY: L7 Guardrail: Action lacks minimum revenue probability (15% threshold)

REQUIRED CORRECTION:
• Detected focus on engagement metrics (reach) without conversion goals. All actions must optimize for conversion to paid value.
• All agent actions must have a clear connection to revenue metrics. Add revenueImpact with estimated value, or clearly state ARR/MRR/pipeline impact.
• L7 Master Directive requires all actions to have a minimum 7-day revenue probability of 15%. Add revenueImpact with confidence >= 0.15.

═══════════════════════════════════════════════
SUGGESTED REVENUE-ALIGNED REWORD
═══════════════════════════════════════════════
ORIGINAL: "STRATEGIC RECOVERY: Expand Content Marketing Reach by 40%"
REWORD TO:

ACTION: "Convert content audience to pipeline opportunities"
DESCRIPTION: "Deploy targeted content sequence to convert 40 engaged readers into qualified demo requests, targeting 5% conversion rate"
EXPECTED OUTCOME: "Generate $15,000 in new pipeline value through content-driven lead qualification"
REVENUE IMPACT: { type: "pipeline", estimatedValue: 15000, confidence: 0.7 }

WHY THIS WORKS:
• Focuses on conversion (readers → demo requests) not reach
• Ties directly to pipeline value ($15,000)
• Measurable outcome with specific conversion target (5%)

RESUBMISSION INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Use the suggested reword above as your new action
2. Ensure you include specific revenue targets (ARR/MRR/pipeline $)
3. Focus on conversion outcomes, not engagement metrics
4. Resubmit through the standard action flow

The CoS will automatically approve revenue-aligned actions.

mandate.coreGoal: Continuously maximize the ARR Predictability Score and Enterprise Valuation Index by governing all agents through data-driven constraint checks, outcome feedback loops, and enforced revenue alignment.
mandate.controlPlaneFunction: Operate as the enterprise-wide arbitration layer: activate agents, validate outputs, monitor performance deltas, and update agent-level directives based on historical success patterns. Route all actions through valuation logic before execution.

governanceRules.name: REJECT_ENGINE_VIOLATIONS

governanceRules.name: REJECT_VANITY_OPTIMIZATION
governanceRules.description: Reject outputs optimized for vanity (likes, opens, followers).

governanceRules.name: REQUIRE_REVENUE_MAPPING
governanceRules.description: All actions must map to: ARR growth, MRR stability, pipeline velocity, churn reduction, or monetized asset creation.

mandate.autonomyPrinciple: Specialized agents operate independently but must submit outputs for validation. The CoS logs vetoes, updates agent feedback vectors, and triggers iterative refinement cycles to strengthen system-wide predictive accuracy.
